title.rendered: Eldorado Stone is Rocking Newspapers From Coast to Coast

content.rendered: Spanning from coast to coast, Eldorado Stone’s The Dylan and The Soho Boutique are featured in dozens of newspapers across the country, including: Detroit News, Burlington Country Times (Willingboro, NJ), Sunday Journal Star (Peoria, IL), The News & Observer (Raleigh, NC), The Charlotte Observer (Charlotte, NC), Eagle (Reading, PA) and Arkansas Democrat Gazette (Little Rock, AR) just to name a few. Giving the feel of elegance yet comfort, the Eldorado Stone fireplace surrounds steal the spotlight in an article focusing on high-tech features and sleek room designs. The headline requests readers to “Warm Up to the Modern Fireplace” – don’t mind if we do as those chilly nights will be here before we know it!
